item.title: Ultimate Comics: Iron Man
item.description:
So much continues to change in the Post-Wave world…

So instead letâ€™s introduce some new foe in the Mandarin. Hacking in and taking over Stark Tech. The Iron Man suit.

Neat idea but feels incomplete. Both in what I expected post Ultimatum and in the resolution.

Onward.
